20110112220715.000|20110112220717.000|TR0|Well, a couple of key pieces of 
20110112220717.000|20110112220719.000|TR0|information that are brand new this day.
20110112220719.000|20110112220722.000|TR0|
20110112220722.000|20110112220724.000|TR0|Number one, we have learned that about 
20110112220724.000|20110112220726.000|TR0|two-and-a-half hours before the shooting 
20110112220726.000|20110112220728.000|TR0|took place last Saturday, that the 
20110112220728.000|20110112220731.000|TR0|suspect, Jared Loughner, was stopped by -- 
20110112220731.000|20110112220733.000|TR0|for a traffic stop at an intersection 
20110112220733.000|20110112220735.000|TR0|about six miles away from the Safeway 
20110112220735.000|20110112220738.000|TR0|shopping center where the shooting was to 
20110112220738.000|20110112220740.000|TR0|occur.  Now, he was pulled over by an 
20110112220740.000|20110112220742.000|TR0|officer with the Arizona Game and Fish 
20110112220742.000|20110112220745.000|TR0|Commission because Loughner had run a red 
20110112220745.000|20110112220747.000|TR0|light. Now the officer pulled him over.  
20110112220747.000|20110112220749.000|TR0|He checked his license.  He did a 
20110112220749.000|20110112220751.000|TR0|background check on him, found that there 
20110112220751.000|20110112220754.000|TR0|were no outstanding warrants.  And 
20110112220754.000|20110112220756.000|TR0|Loughner was allowed to leave with just a 
20110112220756.000|20110112220758.000|TR0|warning.
20110112220758.000|20110112220801.000|TR0|
20110112220801.000|20110112220803.000|TR0|Now, of course, little did that officer 
20110112220803.000|20110112220805.000|TR0|know what was to happen two-and-a-half 
20110112220805.000|20110112220807.000|TR0|hours later.
20110112220807.000|20110112220810.000|TR0|
20110112220810.000|20110112220812.000|TR0|We have also learned some time before or 
20110112220812.000|20110112220814.000|TR0|after that very same morning, that 
20110112220814.000|20110112220817.000|TR0|Loughner showed up at the house.  And our 
20110112220817.000|20110112220819.000|TR0|John King interviewed the chief 
20110112220819.000|20110112220821.000|TR0|investigator of this case, who says that 
20110112220821.000|20110112220823.000|TR0|the father noticed that Jared was out in 
20110112220823.000|20110112220826.000|TR0|the front yard.  He said that he had a 
20110112220826.000|20110112220828.000|TR0|black bag with him and that when his 
20110112220828.000|20110112220830.000|TR0|father asked him about it, he couldn't get 
20110112220830.000|20110112220833.000|TR0|a replay, what is it, what's in the bag?
20110112220833.000|20110112220835.000|TR0|
20110112220835.000|20110112220837.000|TR0|He said that -- whoops, we had a little 
20110112220837.000|20110112220839.000|TR0|accident there with a wind screen, but 
20110112220839.000|20110112220842.000|TR0|that's OK.
20110112220842.000|20110112220844.000|TR0|
20110112220844.000|20110112220846.000|TR0|He said that his father asked Jared about 
20110112220846.000|20110112220849.000|TR0|the bag.  Jared wouldn't tell him what was 
20110112220849.000|20110112220851.000|TR0|in it and mumbled a little bit.  And then 
20110112220851.000|20110112220853.000|TR0|his son left.
20110112220853.000|20110112220855.000|TR0|
20110112220855.000|20110112220858.000|TR0|The police say that Jared's father took 
20110112220858.000|20110112220900.000|TR0|off after him, but couldn't find him and 
20110112220900.000|20110112220902.000|TR0|just assumed he went off to the desert 
20110112220902.000|20110112220905.000|TR0|someplace.
20110112220905.000|20110112220907.000|TR0|
20110112220907.000|20110112220909.000|TR0|Unfortunately, as we've come to know, that 
20110112220909.000|20110112220912.000|TR0|isn't what happened -- Wolf.
20110112220912.000|20110112220914.000|TR0|
20110112220914.000|20110112220916.000|TR0|BLITZER:  And, Susan, no more statements

20110112220918.000|20110112220921.000|TR0|they had just released that statement.  
20110112220921.000|20110112220923.000|TR0|Today, they're silent.  I assume they're 
20110112220923.000|20110112220925.000|TR0|still in their home?
20110112220925.000|20110112220928.000|TR0|

20110112220930.000|20110112220932.000|TR0|what happened.  After they made that 
20110112220932.000|20110112220934.000|TR0|statement, a couple of hours later, they 
20110112220934.000|20110112220937.000|TR0|left their house in the darkness.  They 
20110112220937.000|20110112220939.000|TR0|had hoods pulled up over their head.  A 
20110112220939.000|20110112220941.000|TR0|man who had been at the house earlier put 
20110112220941.000|20110112220944.000|TR0|them in -- into his car and they took off. 
20110112220944.000|20110112220946.000|TR0| We don't know where they are right now.

20110112221011.000|20110112221013.000|TR0|many lawmakers feeling vulnerable.
20110112221013.000|20110112221016.000|TR0|
20110112221016.000|20110112221018.000|TR0|Let's bring in our senior Congressional 
20110112221018.000|20110112221020.000|TR0|correspondent, Dana Bash -- Dana, I know

20110112221023.000|20110112221025.000|TR0|Congress today. And I know a lot of the 
20110112221025.000|20110112221027.000|TR0|members -- because they've told me this -- 
20110112221027.000|20110112221029.000|TR0|are not only worried about themselves, but 
20110112221029.000|20110112221032.000|TR0|perhaps they're even more worried about 
20110112221032.000|20110112221034.000|TR0|their staffers and their aides.
20110112221034.000|20110112221036.000|TR0|
20110112221036.000|20110112221039.000|TR0|DANA BASH, CNN SENIOR CONGRESSIONAL 
20110112221039.000|20110112221041.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT:  You're exactly right.

20110112221900.000|20110112221902.000|TR0|
20110112221902.000|20110112221905.000|TR0|(BEGIN VIDEO CLIP)
20110112221905.000|20110112221907.000|TR0|
20110112221907.000|20110112221909.000|TR0|PALIN:  Especially within hours of a 
20110112221909.000|20110112221912.000|TR0|tragedy unfolding, journalists and pundits 
20110112221912.000|20110112221914.000|TR0|should not manufacture a blood libel that 
20110112221914.000|20110112221916.000|TR0|serves only to incite the very hatred and 
20110112221916.000|20110112221918.000|TR0|violence that they purport to condemn.  
20110112221918.000|20110112221921.000|TR0|That is reprehensible.
20110112221921.000|20110112221923.000|TR0|
20110112221923.000|20110112221925.000|TR0|(END VIDEO CLIP)
20110112221925.000|20110112221928.000|TR0|
20110112221928.000|20110112221930.000|TR0|BLITZER:  All right.  The words "blood 
20110112221930.000|20110112221932.000|TR0|libel," it's got a long history, centuries 
20110112221932.000|20110112221934.000|TR0|of history.  It was the blood libel -- it 
20110112221934.000|20110112221937.000|TR0|refers to Christians blaming Jews over the 
20110112221937.000|20110112221939.000|TR0|centuries for killing little children, 
20110112221939.000|20110112221941.000|TR0|using their blood for Jewish rituals like 
20110112221941.000|20110112221944.000|TR0|baking matzo during Passover and causing 
20110112221944.000|20110112221946.000|TR0|countless numbers of Jews over the years 
20110112221946.000|20110112221948.000|TR0|in (INAUDIBLE) in Europe to be killed.
20110112221948.000|20110112221950.000|TR0|
20110112221950.000|20110112221953.000|TR0|Was it an appropriate use of "blood libel" 
20110112221953.000|20110112221955.000|TR0|in this particular case?
20110112221955.000|20110112221957.000|TR0|
20110112221957.000|20110112222000.000|TR0|GLORIA BORGER, CNN SENIOR POLITICAL 
20110112222000.000|20110112222002.000|TR0|ANALYST:  You know, look, I think these 
20110112222002.000|20110112222004.000|TR0|are difficult words and at a time when you 
20110112222004.000|20110112222006.000|TR0|want to be a national leader, I think it's 
20110112222006.000|20110112222009.000|TR0|your job to ratchet down the rhetoric 
20110112222009.000|20110112222011.000|TR0|rather than ratchet it up.       These 
20110112222011.000|20110112222013.000|TR0|words have been used in a "Wall Street 
20110112222013.000|20110112222016.000|TR0|Journal" op-ed the day before.  We can 
20110112222016.000|20110112222018.000|TR0|argue about whether or not she should have 
20110112222018.000|20110112222020.000|TR0|used them.  What I think is important is 
20110112222020.000|20110112222022.000|TR0|that her defenders had been making a very 
20110112222022.000|20110112222025.000|TR0|good case for her.  People and the 
20110112222025.000|20110112222027.000|TR0|American public now believes that she 
20110112222027.000|20110112222029.000|TR0|didn't have anything to do with this, that 
20110112222029.000|20110112222032.000|TR0|the rhetoric doesn't have anything to do 
20110112222032.000|20110112222034.000|TR0|with this.  The case had been made.
20110112222034.000|20110112222036.000|TR0|
20110112222036.000|20110112222039.000|TR0|So what Sarah Palin should have gone out 
20110112222039.000|20110112222041.000|TR0|there and done is, the top of her speech, 
20110112222041.000|20110112222043.000|TR0|which was essentially a call for unity and 
20110112222043.000|20110112222045.000|TR0|a declaration of sending your sympathies 
20110112222045.000|20110112222048.000|TR0|to the families, et cetera, et cetera.
20110112222048.000|20110112222050.000|TR0|
20110112222050.000|20110112222052.000|TR0|So when you're a national leader, you 
20110112222052.000|20110112222055.000|TR0|know, we look to you at these moments for

20110112222849.000|20110112222851.000|TR0|STARR (voice-over):  When Congresswoman

20110112222855.000|20110112222858.000|TR0|it was experience brought from the war

20110112222902.000|20110112222905.000|TR0|
20110112222905.000|20110112222907.000|TR0|DR. PETER RHEE, CHIEF OF TRAUMA, 
20110112222907.000|20110112222909.000|TR0|UNIVERSITY MEDICAL CENTER:  The resources 
20110112222909.000|20110112222911.000|TR0|of the entire military has been made 
20110112222911.000|20110112222914.000|TR0|available to us.       STARR:  Working on 
20110112222914.000|20110112222916.000|TR0|Giffords, Dr. Peter Rhee chief of trauma 
20110112222916.000|20110112222918.000|TR0|at University Medical Center.  A Navy 
20110112222918.000|20110112222921.000|TR0|doctor for more than 20 years, he treated 
20110112222921.000|20110112222923.000|TR0|the wounded in Fallujah, Iraq.
20110112222923.000|20110112222925.000|TR0|
20110112222925.000|20110112222928.000|TR0|At the behest of Admiral Mike Mullen, 
20110112222928.000|20110112222930.000|TR0|chairman of the Joint Chiefs, the military 
20110112222930.000|20110112222932.000|TR0|flew in two of its best, schooled from 
20110112222932.000|20110112222934.000|TR0|years in the war zone on ways to deal with 
20110112222934.000|20110112222937.000|TR0|brain injuries and gunshot wounds, 
20110112222937.000|20110112222939.000|TR0|including retired Army neurosurgeon Dr. 
20110112222939.000|20110112222941.000|TR0|James Ecklund, a veteran of Iraq and 
20110112222941.000|20110112222944.000|TR0|Afghanistan.
20110112222944.000|20110112222946.000|TR0|
20110112222946.000|20110112222948.000|TR0|(on camera):  Because you have now treated 
20110112222948.000|20110112222950.000|TR0|so many cases of either blast injury or 
20110112222950.000|20110112222953.000|TR0|penetrating gunshot wounds in the war 
20110112222953.000|20110112222955.000|TR0|zone, what has the neurosurgery field 
20110112222955.000|20110112222957.000|TR0|learned from 10 years of war?
20110112222957.000|20110112223000.000|TR0|
20110112223000.000|20110112223002.000|TR0|DR. JAMES ECKLUND, ARMY NEUROSURGEON:  I 
20110112223002.000|20110112223004.000|TR0|think one of the major lessons we've 
20110112223004.000|20110112223006.000|TR0|learned in this conflict is that with 
20110112223006.000|20110112223009.000|TR0|blast injury, there is often a higher 
20110112223009.000|20110112223011.000|TR0|incidence of early cerebral edema, very -- 
20110112223011.000|20110112223013.000|TR0|you know, a lot of swelling of the brain 
20110112223013.000|20110112223016.000|TR0|that occurs early on.  As a result, early 
20110112223016.000|20110112223018.000|TR0|on in this conflict we saw a larger volume 
20110112223018.000|20110112223020.000|TR0|or need for a procedure called 
20110112223020.000|20110112223022.000|TR0|decompressive craniectomy, which is when 
20110112223022.000|20110112223025.000|TR0|an operation is done, instead of taking 
20110112223025.000|20110112223027.000|TR0|the bone flap on and putting it back on, 
20110112223027.000|20110112223029.000|TR0|you take the bone flap off to do what you 
20110112223029.000|20110112223032.000|TR0|need to do and leave it off because of 
20110112223032.000|20110112223034.000|TR0|swelling.
20110112223034.000|20110112223036.000|TR0|
20110112223036.000|20110112223039.000|TR0|STARR (voice-over):  Ecklund made clear 
20110112223039.000|20110112223041.000|TR0|with wounds to the brain, it's almost 
20110112223041.000|20110112223043.000|TR0|impossible to predict right away what will 
20110112223043.000|20110112223045.000|TR0|happen.  He recalled for us a young 
20110112223045.000|20110112223048.000|TR0|soldier who was brought in.
20110112223048.000|20110112223050.000|TR0|
20110112223050.000|20110112223052.000|TR0|ECKLUND:  I immediately put a tube in to a 
20110112223052.000|20110112223055.000|TR0|ventricle which is the fluid sack of the 
20110112223055.000|20110112223057.000|TR0|brain, to release some pressure.
20110112223057.000|20110112223059.000|TR0|
20110112223059.000|20110112223101.000|TR0|STARR:  Almost given up for dead, but the 
20110112223101.000|20110112223104.000|TR0|docs kept working on him and he began to 
20110112223104.000|20110112223106.000|TR0|come back.
20110112223106.000|20110112223108.000|TR0|
20110112223108.000|20110112223111.000|TR0|ECKLUND:  I received a Christmas card from 
20110112223111.000|20110112223113.000|TR0|him a year and a half later.
20110112223113.000|20110112223115.000|TR0|
20110112223115.000|20110112223117.000|TR0|(END VIDEOTAPE)
20110112223117.000|20110112223120.000|TR0|

20110112223124.000|20110112223127.000|TR0|captain --- of course, the congresswoman's 
20110112223127.000|20110112223129.000|TR0|husband. But, you know, these military

20110112223337.000|20110112223339.000|TR0|was remarkable.  As you said, it's been 
20110112223339.000|20110112223342.000|TR0|almost 30 years since Jim Brady was shot 
20110112223342.000|20110112223344.000|TR0|in the head in the assassination attempt 
20110112223344.000|20110112223346.000|TR0|on President Reagan.  And since then, he 
20110112223346.000|20110112223349.000|TR0|and his wife Sarah have been tireless 
20110112223349.000|20110112223351.000|TR0|advocates for the issue of gun control, 
20110112223351.000|20110112223353.000|TR0|something that hasn't been too easy lately

20110112225613.000|20110112225615.000|TR0|common.  About 14 percent of 
20110112225615.000|20110112225617.000|TR0|middle-schoolers in the country are 
20110112225617.000|20110112225620.000|TR0|subject to these tests. That's according
